name: agri_bot_cameroon
description: An AI agent providing vital agricultural info for farmers in Cameroon.
long_description: ðŸŒ¾ Agri-Bot Cameroon is a versatile, multilingual AI agent designed to provide critical agricultural information. It can provide real-time market prices, pest/disease diagnosis, weather forecasts, farming best practices, soil information, and fertilizer guides in both English and French. When a user sends a message, the agent analyzes the keywords to determine the user's intent and provides a helpful, formatted response. For example, a message containing 'price of cocoa' will return the current market price, while a message like 'problÃ¨me avec mon maÃ¯s' will trigger the diagnostic feature.
